title: Test task - Analyze source codebase and create implementation plan
description: Analyze the old hydro-esp32 project to understand architecture, dependencies, and best practices. Create a comprehensive implementation plan for the new Hydromatic project starting with WiFi, OTA, and Time Sync modules.
acceptance_criteria: Analyzed old codebase structure and identified all major modules
Created FUNCTIONALITY_SPEC.md with detailed Phase 1 requirements
Created task files for WiFi Manager, Time Manager, OTA Manager
Created task file for config.json setup

investigation.finding: Found 12,700 LOC across 28 modules in layered architecture with clear separation of concerns

solution.approach: Function-first design: specify what needs to happen before coding how. Start with WiFi (enables everything), Time Sync (critical for logging/scheduling), then OTA (enables remote updates).

verification.test_results: Analyzed codebase, created FUNCTIONALITY_SPEC.md, and generated 6 implementation tasks for Phase 1 (WiFi, Time Sync, OTA)
